column5: a wofi Josef ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu egyanom efi do etsitsir no bae
column8: Israelmba egyanom efi do etsitsir no enyim:"

column3: EWURADZE hyɛɛ mo wura dɛ ɔmfa tontotwe nkyɛ asaase no mu mma Israelmba ma wɔnyɛ no egyapadze: na mo wura na EWURADZE hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔmfa hɛn nua Zelofehad n'egyapadze mma ne mbabaa."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔwar hɔn ma Israelmba ebusuakuw bi mu mbabanyin biara a
column3: ɔno wonyi hɔn egyapadze no mfi hɛn egyanom egyapadze mu
column4: na wɔmfa nkɛka ebusuakuw kor a wɔakɛyɛ hɔndze no egyapadze ho: dɛm na wonyi mfi hɛn egyapadze kyɛfa no mu."

column2: "Na sɛ Israelmba ahosɛpɛw afe no du a
column3: ɔno wɔmfa hɔn egyapadze no nkɛka ebusuakuw kor a wɔakɛyɛ hɔndze no egyapadze ho: ma woeyi hɔn egyapadze efi hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw egyapadze no mu."

column2: "Na Moses hyɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm tse
column4: Josef ne mbabanyin ebusuakuw no aka no tsenn."

column2: "Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE hyɛe wɔ Zelofehad mbabaa no ho no
column4: Wɔmma wɔnwarwar hɔn a wɔdwen hɔn dɛ woye no: hɔn egya n'ebusuakuw mu ebusua no ara nko na wɔnwarwar wɔ mu."

column2: "Amma Israelmba egyapadze biara eemmfi ebusuakuw kor mu annkɔ ebusuakuw fofor bi mu: na Israelmba no ntakyer hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw egyapadze ho."
"Na ɔbabaa biara a onya egyapadze wɔ Israelmba ebusuakuw biara mu no
column3: ɔnyɛ n'egya ebusuakuw mu ebusua no mu obi ne yer
column4: ama Israelmba no eenyinya nyimpa biara n'egyanom egyapadze edzi."

column2: "Amma egyapadze biara eemmfi ebusuakuw kor mu annkɔ ebusuakuw kor so mu; na Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no ntakyer hɔnankasa hɔn egyapadze ho."
"Mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no
column3: dɛmara na Zelofehad ne mbabaa no yɛe:"

column7: Zelofehad mbabaa no warwaar hɔn egya no nuanom mbabanyin no."

column2: "Wɔwarwaar hɔn kɔr Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu
column3: na hɔn egyapadze no kaa hɔn egya n'ebusua ebusuakuw no mu."
EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛɛ Israelmba wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan do."
